text.author: Pr∞fWiki
text.title: Wosets are Isomorphic to Each Other or Initial Segments/Proof Without Using Choice
text.summary: This mathematical proof shows that two wosets S and T, ordered sets with a well-ordering, must be order isomorphic to each other, or else one set is order isomorphic to an initial segment of the other, trivially if they contain less than two elements, and otherwise provably using a relation ⪯, which is shown to be a reflexive, transitive and antisymmetric total well-ordering.
